participant_1.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i play a lot of call of duty. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

participant_2.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college.

content.text: In my free time, I enjoy listening to and writing poetry, as well as trying various coffees! I am also a huge star wars fan and I used to play football in the third division in college
that is cool . i like to read .

i like to go to the beach .
how often do you go to the beach?
i do not have a lot of time for that
